name: Dead Man's Plate
tooltip:
Dead Man's Plate

Cost: 2900
+40 Armor
+475 Health
+5% Move Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Shipwrecker: While moving, build stacks of Momentum, granting up to 60 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks. Momentum decays by 3 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Attacks deal 1 magic damage on-hit per stack of Momentum, consuming all stacks. At max stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second if the attacker is melee.
